tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.db

Class RemoteLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.db.RemoteLayoutManager

  • class RemoteLayoutManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the all of the remote Layouts. Manages creating, retrieving, modifying and deleting layouts.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Mckey

        @NonNull
private java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>> mLayouts

      • saveCodeLayouts

        public void saveCodeLayouts()
        Saves the current Layout Map to the associated json file.

      • loadLayoutData

        public void loadLayoutData()
        Loads the layout data from the JSON file to the Layouts Map, for easy access and modification.

      • getCorrespondingCodeId

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Long getCorrespondingCodeId(@NonNull
                                                        RemoteEntity remote,
                                                        int viewId)
        Gets the Id of the code associated with the give view
        Parameters:
        remote - the selected remote to get the layout for
        viewId - the view to get the code for
        Returns:
        the code in the specified remote that is associated with the given view

      • setCorrespondingCode

        public void setCorrespondingCode(@NonNull
                                 RemoteEntity remote,
                                 @NonNull
                                 java.lang.String resourceName,
                                 @Nullable
                                 CodeEntity code)
        Sets the Code(codeId) associated with the given view(resource name)
        Parameters:
        remote - the selected remote
        resourceName - the resource name of the view the code Id is associated with
        code - the code to associate with the view

      • getLayout

        @NonNull
public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getLayout(@NonNull
                                                                              RemoteEntity remote)
        Gets the layout that is associated with the given remote
        Parameters:
        remote - the remote to get the layout for
        Returns:
        the Layout HashMap(buttonResourceName(String), codeId(long))

      • createLayout

        public void createLayout(long remoteId,
                         @NonNull
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> layout)
        Inserts a new remote layout into the database
        Parameters:
        remoteId - the id of the remote the layout is associated with
        layout - the layout Map(buttonResourceName(String), codeId(long))

      • deleteLayout

        public void deleteLayout(long remoteId)
        Deletes a remote layout from the database
        Parameters:
        remoteId - the remote id the layout is associated with
